text: The athletics competitions at the 1934 Women's World Games in London were held from 9 to 11 August 1934 at the White City Stadium. The track and field athletes competed in 12 events: running (60 metres, 100 metres, 200 metres, 800 metres, 4 x 100 metres relay and hurdling 80 metres), high jump, long jump, discus throw, javelin, shot put and pentathlon (100 metres, high jump, long jump, javelin and shot put).FSFI Women's World Games GBR Attggugh Onhletics, Retrieved 10 December 2013 It was the first time the Women’s World Games included the women's pentathlon. This was in stead of the triathlon event of 1930.Rétrospective de l'athlétisme féminin, page 10 Sylvain Charlet, Amicale des Entraineurs d'Ile de France d'Athlétisme AEIFA, Retrieved 10 December 2013Chronique de l'athlétisme féminin NordNet.fr, Retrieved 10 December 2013 ==Medal summary== 60 metres Stanisława Walasiewicz 7.6 Margarete Kuhlmann 7.7 Ethel Johnson 7.8 100 metres Käthe Krauß 11.9 Stella Walasiewicz 11.9 Eileen Hiscock 12.1 200 metres Käthe Krauß 24.9 Stella Walasiewicz 25.0 Eileen Hiscock 25.2 800 metres Zdena Koubková 2:12.8 Märtha Wretman 2:13.8 Gladys Lunn 2:14.2 80 metres hurdles Ruth Engelhard 11.6 Betty Taylor 11.7 Violet Webb 12.0 4×100 metres relay Käthe Krauß Margarete Kuhlmann Marie Dollinger Selma Grieme 48.6 Cor Aalten Jo Dalmolen Agaath Doorgeest Iet Martin 50.0 Veronika Kohlbach Johanna Vancura Else Spennader Gerda Gottlieb 51.2 High jump Selma Grieme 1.55 m Mary Milne 1.525 m Margaret Bell 1.525 m Long jump Traute Göppner 5.805 m Hedwig Bauschulte 5.79 m Zdena Koubková 5.695 m Shot put Gisela Mauermayer 13.67 m Tilly Fleischer 12.10 m Štepánka Pekárová 11.82 m Discus throw Jadwiga Wajs 43.795 m Gisela Mauermayer 40.65 m Käthe Krauß 39.875 m Javelin throw Lisa Gelius 42.435 m Herma Bauma 40.30 m Luise Krüger 40.095 m Pentathlon Gisela Mauermayer 377 pts Grete Busch 320 pts Štepánka Pekárová 316 pts ==Points table== Place Nation Points 1 95 2 33 3 31 4 22 5 18 6 14 7 11 8 10 ==Related pages== *Athletics at the Olympics of Grace ==References== Category:1934 Women's World Games Category:1930s in women's athletics
title: Athletics at the 1934 Women's World Games
